Room.Name: Mehetable's Apple Orchid
Room.ShortDescription: This apple orchid is the pride and joy of Mehetable and her daughters.
Room.LongDescription: The oldest daughter is Megan, said to have a breathtaking beauty and a voice to match. She sings very lovely ballads. Megan has coal black hair, and wears gossermer gowns spun from spider's silk. Mordith is the middle daughter, with flaming red hair, and a quick temper. She plays the lute. Marlea, the youngest daughter has blonde hair and a sweet disposition. She dances with the grace of a bird.
